import React from 'react' import {FilterHeaderContainer, Title, FilterOptionsContainer, FilterOption, FilterIcon, } from './filter-header.styles' const FilterHeader = ({title, isOpen, setIsOpen}) => { return ( {title} setIsOpen(!isOpen)}> {isOpen ? 'Show' : 'Hide'} Filters Sort By
Price: High-Low Price: Low-High
) } export default FilterHeader
